name: One Hour Challenge
description:
Arrows to control the charecter. 

Collect the key and go in the door to go to next level.

I made a game in only one hour. It was super fun and I am looking forward to do more challenges. I underestemated the time and didnt get everything done. If you want to know more about the development watch my youtube video down 🡻🡻🡻🡻.
